New Records: Sri Lanka recorded their lowest total in T20 cricket, being dismissed for 77.
Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje took 4 wickets for 7 runs in four overs.
South Africa defeated Sri Lanka by six wickets.
Kusal Mendis was the top-scorer for Sri Lanka with 19 off 30 balls.
South Africa chased down the target with the loss of four wickets.
